name: IG-88
Lore: 'Bounty hunter. Went berserk upon activation. Murdered all designers at Holowan Mechanicals. IG-88''s outstanding ''dismantle on sight'' warrant ignored by Darth Vader.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. May ''assassinate'' any character at same site hit by IG-88 (victim is immediately lost). May use two different weapons. May initiate battle and be battled. Immune to Restraining Bolt and purchase.',
